courseDetails.title: Video Editing with Avid Media Composer First for Beginners
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn the critical fundamentals of video editing with Avid Media Composer.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Requirements

  • A licensed copy of Avid Media Composer First ( Free to download )

Description

Avid Media Composer is widely used video production software in Film and TV industry.

This training class provides the critical fundamentals of video editing with Avid Media Composer for beginners.


In this course we have covered the basics of editing with Avid where you get a detailed look at the workings of the interface and learn how to do Basic Edits and apply Transitions.

There are some additional videos that I will continue to upload to explain the interface change(s). I estimate it will take a year to two for the industry to slowly adapt to the new interface.

It is recommended that you have a recent version of Avid Media Composer installed before taking this course.


The following modules have been covered in this course:

  • Introduction to Avid and Overview

  • Working with Project Settings

  • Overview of User Interface

  • Working with System Settings

  • Working with Time Line & Monitor Settings

  • Working with Video Imports

  • Learning Media Organisation

  • Learning Timeline Organisation

  • Learning Basic Editing

  • Working with Trimming

  • Working with Keyboard Shortcuts & Customization

  • Working with  transitions

This course is designed to help you get started with Avid Media Composer.


Who this course is for:

  • This training focuses on editing techniques from the ground up. It is intended for those who are new to Avid Media Composer.

  • Intermediate to Advanced users may find some lessons that will enhance their current workflows and save them time.

  • Film Editing Professionals

  • Film-making Students

  • Anyone who wants to learn how to do Non-Linear Video Editing.
targetAudiences: Anyone who wants to learn how to do Non-Linear Video Editing.

courseDetails.title: Der komplette WordPress-Kurs für Einsteiger
courseDetails.shortDescription: Erstellen Sie professionell aussehende Websites und Blogs in wenigen Minuten mit WordPress und diesem einfachen Tutorial
courseDetails.longDescription:
WordPress ist ein großartiges Tool, das Sie berherrschen sollten, wenn Sie professionelle Webseiten erstellen möchten. Dieser Kurs zeigt Ihnen genau, wie das geht.

Mit diesem leicht verständlichen Leitfaden erfahren Sie alles, was Sie über WordPress wissen müssen - von der Installation Ihres ersten Blogs bis zu dessen Aufrechterhaltung nach dem Start.

Es wird nicht nur das Rahmenkonzept eines WordPress-basierten Systems behandelt, sondern auch die praktischen Aspekte der Erstellung einer modernen Webseite oder eines Blogs.

Sie beginnen mit den WordPress-Bausteinen und der Installation, gefolgt von der Theorie des Content Managements. Anschließend lernen Sie die wichtigsten Bausteine des WordPress-Admin-Panels kennen.

Im nächsten Teil lernen Sie etwas über Beiträge, Seiten und Foren. Die Plugin-Verwaltung ist die nächste Einheit, die Sie durch das Hinzufügen von coolen Galerien und Videos zu Ihrer Website oder Ihrem Blog führen wird. Sie werden auch etwas über SEO und Meta-Tags erfahren.

Im letzten Teil dieses Kurses geht es um Themes, die Ihre Webseite professionell aussehen lassen und ihr das gewünschte Design verleihen. Sie werden auch lernen, wie Sie Ihre eigenen Themes erstellen können.


Warum diesen Kurs wählen?

Konzipiert für Einsteiger: Unser WordPress-Kurs wurde aus der Perspektive eines Anfängers konzipiert und bietet eine Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung von der Basis bis zur Inbetriebnahme Ihrer WordPress-Website.

Lernen Sie von den Schultern eines Profis: Wir führen Sie durch alle wichtigen Optionen von WordPress und erklären Ihnen, was die einzelnen Optionen bewirken und wie Sie sie einrichten. Außerdem können Sie einem WordPress-Experten über die Schulter schauen, da er Ihnen zeigt, wie Sie eine WordPress-Website erstellen. Am Ende dieses Kurses werden Sie eine Website haben, auf die Sie wirklich stolz sein können.

Keine Programmiererfahrung erforderlich: Dieses WordPress-Tutorial für Anfänger ist eine fantastische Ressource für die Erstellung Ihrer eigenen Website - ohne Programmierkenntnisse. Diese Anleitung ist perfekt für Sie, wenn Sie keine Vorkenntnisse in HTML, CSS, JavaScript oder PHP haben und einen schönen Blog mit minimalem Aufwand erstellen möchten.


Das ultimative WordPress-Tutorial für Einsteiger!

Wenn Sie sich für das Bloggen interessieren, aber von der übermäßigen Komplexität eingeschüchtert sind, ist dies die perfekte Lösung. Alles, was Sie brauchen, ist ein Computer mit Internetanschluss und ein Browser. Sie müssen keine Programmierkenntnisse haben.

Werden Sie mit diesem Kurs ein WordPress-Profi!
targetAudiences: Jeder, der eine Website für sein Unternehmen, sein Hobby oder einen zahlenden Kunden erstellen möchte.
Dieser Kurs ist genau das Richtige für Sie, wenn Sie alle Besonderheiten von Wordpress verstehen wollen, ohne sich in technischen Details zu verlieren.
Wenn Sie eine bestehende Wordpress-Website übernehmen oder von Grund auf neu erstellen möchten, aber nicht wissen, wo Sie anfangen sollen, ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für Sie.
Jeder, der ein Wordpress-Experte werden möchte, sollte diesen Kurs besuchen.

courseDetails.title: Business development and sales processes - a bird's eye view
courseDetails.shortDescription: A complete black book on high business development and sales. Prepare, pitch and persuade your prospects and clients.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our comprehensive Udemy course on sales! Whether you're a seasoned sales professional looking to brush up on your skills or a newcomer to the field, this course has something to offer you. Throughout the ten modules of this course, we'll cover all aspects of sales, from the basics of understanding the role of sales in business to the latest trends and technologies impacting the industry.

ATTENTION: this course will be updated month after month. More content will be added along the way.
--> Next price update: September 2023, so make sure you buy the course now.

In Module 1, we'll start by laying the foundation for our understanding of sales. We'll explore the key skills and qualities needed for success in sales, as well as the different types of sales and sales models that are used in various industries.

From there, we'll dive into the nitty-gritty of prospecting and lead generation in Module 2. You'll learn how to identify and qualify potential customers, as well as strategies for generating leads through cold calling and email outreach. We'll also cover how to manage your sales leads effectively using a sales funnel.

In Module 3, we'll explore the importance of building rapport and establishing trust with your customers. You'll learn proven techniques for building relationships with prospects and customers, as well as how to establish trust and credibility with your clients.

Moving on to Module 4, we'll cover the critical topic of understanding customer needs. You'll learn techniques for identifying pain points and challenges that your customers face and how to use that information to tailor your sales approach to meet their specific needs and preferences.

In Module 5, we'll delve into different sales techniques, including consultative selling and solution selling. We'll also cover strategies for overcoming objections and closing deals and explore negotiation techniques and tactics.

Module 6 focuses on sales management and team leadership. You'll learn how to manage a sales team effectively and set sales goals that are both achievable and motivating. We'll also cover coaching and training sales reps for success, as well as metrics and KPIs for measuring sales performance.

In Module 7, we'll explore strategies for building and maintaining strong customer relationships. You'll learn about the tools and technologies used in customer relationship management, as well as the importance of customer satisfaction and retention in sales.

Module 8 addresses the ethical considerations and responsibilities of sales professionals. We'll cover best practices for maintaining professionalism in sales, as well as how to avoid common ethical and legal pitfalls.

Moving into the digital age, Module 9 covers the impact of technology on sales and sales processes. We'll explore leveraging digital channels for lead generation and sales, as well as the future of sales in an increasingly digital world.

Finally, in Module 10, we'll recap the key takeaways from the course and provide actionable steps for improving your sales skills and performance. We'll also share resources and further reading for continued learning and development in sales.

By the end of this course, you'll have a comprehensive understanding of the sales process, along with the skills and tools you need to excel in the field. Let's get started!
targetAudiences: This is a course for beginners as well as experienced salespeople who want to up their game and feel more confident in their profession.

courseDetails.title: The Complete NFT Course: Become an NFT Creator & Investor
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn about NFT collections, NFT marketplaces, NFT use cases, NFT Minting, NFT Buying, NFT Selling, and NFT Security
courseDetails.longDescription:
Ever since Bitcoin forced most people to learn about cryptocurrencies in recent years, there hasn’t been any other technology that garnered as much attention as NFTs. Running on the same blockchain technology as most cryptocurrencies, it’s like crypto, but for another purpose.

This course shows you how NFTs work and their connection with blockchain technology. You'll learn the theoretical aspect of the new technology and what function it serves in real life. This course is an all-in-one guide suitable for both amateurs and professionals alike.

To make it easier to understand the course, it is separated into several subsections. This is designed to help both beginners and experts jump around more efficiently while taking the course.

If you’re only hearing about non-fungible tokens for the first time, we recommend following the course outline as it’s arranged. It will help you make sense out of the already confusing world of non-fungible tokens. The learning resources also contains recommendations of sites and software to help you get started!

While you can easily mint, buy, and sell NFTs without proper education, it’s important to know about what you’re dealing with. That way, it will be easier to invite people to the world of NFTs since you know what you can tell them to get them interested.
targetAudiences: Professionals or students who want to venture into non-fungible tokens and are keen to learn the science behind them
Artists who harbor a dream of offering their art as an NFT, and are looking at exploring the possibilities and options
Art galleries aiming to collect and preserve digital art
Anyone willing to learn about the best methods for creating, collecting, and selling NFTs

courseDetails.title: Komplett NFT-Kurs: Werden Sie ein NFT-Ersteller und-Investor
courseDetails.shortDescription: Erfahren Sie mehr über NFT-Sammlungen, NFT-Marktplätze, NFT-Anwendungsfälle, NFT-Minting, NFT-Kauf, NFT-Verkauf
courseDetails.longDescription:
Seit Bitcoin die meisten Menschen in den letzten Jahren gezwungen hat, sich mit Kryptowährungen zu beschäftigen, hat keine andere Technologie so viel Aufmerksamkeit erregt wie NFTs. Sie basieren auf der gleichen Blockchain-Technologie wie die meisten Kryptowährungen, sind also wie Kryptowährungen, nur mit einem anderen Zweck.

Dieser Kurs zeigt Ihnen, wie NFTs funktionieren und wie sie mit der Blockchain-Technologie zusammenhängen. Sie lernen den theoretischen Aspekt der neuen Technologie kennen und erfahren, welche Funktion sie im realen Leben hat. Dieser Kurs ist ein All-in-One-Leitfaden, der sowohl für Amateure als auch für Profis geeignet ist.

Um das Verständnis des Kurses zu erleichtern, ist er in mehrere Unterabschnitte unterteilt. Dies soll sowohl Anfängern als auch Experten helfen, sich während des Kurses besser zurechtzufinden.

Wenn Sie zum ersten Mal von nicht-fungiblen Token hören, empfehle ich Ihnen, der Gliederung des Kurses zu folgen. Sie wird Ihnen helfen, sich in der ohnehin schon verwirrenden Welt der nicht-fungiblen Token zurechtzufinden. Die Lernressourcen enthalten auch Empfehlungen von Websites und Software, die Ihnen den Einstieg erleichtern.

Obwohl Sie NFTs auch ohne eine entsprechende Ausbildung problemlos prägen, kaufen und verkaufen können, ist es wichtig, dass Sie wissen, womit Sie es zu tun haben. Auf diese Weise wird es einfacher, andere Menschen in die Welt der NFTs einzuladen, da Sie wissen, was Sie ihnen erzählen können, um ihr Interesse zu wecken.
targetAudiences: Berufstätige oder Studenten, die sich in den Bereich der nichtfälschbaren Münzen einarbeiten und die Wissenschaft dahinter kennenlernen möchten
Künstler, die davon träumen, ihre Kunst als NFT anzubieten, und die Möglichkeiten und Optionen ausloten möchten
Kunstgalerien, die digitale Kunst sammeln und bewahren wollen
Alle, die mehr über die besten Methoden zum Erstellen, Sammeln und Verkaufen von NFTs erfahren möchten

courseDetails.title: Formation WordPress: Créez 1 Site rapidement en partant de 0
courseDetails.shortDescription: Créez des sites Web et des blogs de qualité professionnelle en quelques minutes avec WordPress
courseDetails.longDescription:
WordPress est un excellent outil à avoir dans votre poche arrière si vous souhaitez créer des sites Web professionnels. Ce cours vous montrera exactement comment faire cela.

Soyez opérationnel avec ce cours facile à suivre pour tout ce que vous devez savoir sur WordPress, de l’installation de votre premier site à sa maintenance après son lancement.

Il couvre non seulement le cadre conceptuel d’un système basé sur WordPress, mais il couvre également les aspects pratiques de la construction d’un site Web.

Vous commencerez par les blocs de constructions et l’installation de WordPress. Vous apprendrez ensuite les principaux éléments constitutifs du panneau d’administration WordPress.

La partie suivante vous apprendra tout sur les publications, les pages et les forums. La gestion des plugins est la prochaine étape qui vous guidera dans l’ajout de galerie et de vidéos intéressantes à votre site Web.

Vous apprendrez également à connaitre le référencement et les tags Meta.

La dernière partie de ce cours portera sur les thèmes qui donnent à votre site un aspect professionnel et lui donnent le design que vous aimez. Vous apprendrez également à créer vos propres thèmes.


Pourquoi choisir ce cours?

Créé pour les novices: Ce cours sur WordPress a été conçu d’un point de vue de novice pour fournir un guide étape par étape depuis le début jusqu’à la mise en ligne de votre site Web.

Apprenez grâce au conseil d’un professionnel : Nous vous expliquerons toutes les options de WordPress, leurs utilisations et bien d’autres choses. Vous explorerez Wordpress à travers les yeux d’un professionnel comment créer votre site web avec WordPress. A la fin de ce cours, vous aurez un site web don’t vous pourrez être fier.

Pas d’expérience de programmation requise : Ce tutorial WordPress pour novice est une ressource fantastique pour construire son site web – sans expérience ni connaissance de code. Ce guide est parfait pour vous, que vous n’ayez aucune connaissance en HTML, CSS, JavaScript ou PHP et si vous vouliez créer un blog de qualité.


Le tutorial WordPress ultime pour les novices !

Si vous êtes intéressés par créer votre blog mais intimidés par la complexité que cela représente, ce cours est pour vous ! Tout ce dont vous avez besoin, c’est un ordinateur avec une connexion internet et un module de recherche. Vous n’avez pas besoin de connaissance de code ou de programmation.

Deviens un professionnel de WordPress avec ce cours!
targetAudiences: Tous ceux qui veulent créer un site web pour son business, passe-temps ou encore pour un client
Ce cours est fait pour vous si vous voulez comprendre tous les tenants et les aboutissants de Wordpress sans vous perdre dans les détails techniques
Si vous avez besoin de reprendre un site Wordpress existant ou d'en créer un à partir de rien mais que vous ne savez pas par où commencer, ce cours est fait pour vous
Toute personne aspirant à devenir un expert Wordpress devrait suivre ce cours

courseDetails.title: Excel VBA pour débutants: Formation pas à pas sur Excel VBA
courseDetails.shortDescription: Apprendre et Maitrisez Microsoft Excel VBA de A à Z !
courseDetails.longDescription:
VBA (Visual Basic for Application) est un langage utilisé pour programmer des tâches et des actions dans Excel ou développer des fonctions supplémentaires dans des feuilles de calcul Excel adaptées à vos besoins de travail.

Si vous souhaitez apprendre à programmer VBA pour votre entreprise ou pour vous-même, ce cours vous est destiné. En tant que cours pour débutants, vous apprendrez les bases de la compréhension de VBA et de ce qu'il fait. Vous apprendrez comment enregistrer votre première macro, suivi d'un développement progressif dans l'apprentissage de tout le langage fondamental VBA menant à la création de votre propre module VBA.

A la fin du cours, vous aurez appris à créer vos formulaires d'utilisateur avec lesquels d'autres utilisateurs pourront interagir et saisir leurs données.

Vous pourrez ensuite dépanner et déboguer vos codes en les rendant efficaces et plus rapides tout en créant vos propres fonctions Excel personnalisées.

L'un des nombreux aspects de VBA est que lorsque vous l'apprenez, vous le savez, et il devient une partie de vous pour toujours et à long terme, vous pouvez le programmer pour faire tout votre travail.


Pourquoi suivre ce cours ?

Automatisez votre travail : vous apprenez à utiliser VBA pour automatiser les procédures, les rapports d'activités. Tout cela peut être configurés à l'aide de VBA et, d'une simple pression sur un bouton, vous pouvez générer votre rapport et vous aider à effectuer différentes actions en appuyant sur un bouton.

Accélérez votre travail : utilisez VBA pour gagner du temps en automatisant la tâche répétitive. Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. VBA Excel permet de gagner du temps en terminant la même action sur plusieurs classeurs Excel, ce qui vous fait gagner beaucoup de temps grâce à une action automatisée.

Il est conçu pour les débutants : ce cours est un guide étape par étape pour une compréhension facile pour les personnes qui n'ont aucune connaissance de ce qu'est VBA mais qui ont des connaissances sur Excel.
targetAudiences: Ce programme VBA Excel est destiné aux débutants sans connaissances préalables sur VBA
Pour une expérience personnelle ou pour votre travail, ou votre entreprise, et pour tous ceux qui cherchent à ajouter une signification supplémentaire à leurs connaissances et compétences.

courseDetails.title: Car Coolant System : Learning every aspect of Water Cooling
courseDetails.shortDescription: Step-by-step guidance for replacing components and performing routine maintenance
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Mastering Automotive Coolant Systems: Comprehensive Guide to Water Cooling." This course is designed to equip you with in-depth knowledge and practical skills to understand, troubleshoot, and maintain car coolant systems effectively.

Whether you're a car enthusiast, aspiring mechanic, or simply curious about the intricacies of automotive cooling, this course is your comprehensive guide to water cooling systems. You'll gain a solid foundation in the principles of cooling, exploring the components, functions, and maintenance aspects of car coolant systems.

Throughout this course, you'll embark on a journey to learn every aspect of water cooling in a clear and engaging manner. Here's a breakdown of the key modules and topics covered:

Introduction to Automotive Cooling Systems

Understanding the importance of coolant systems in vehicles

Overview of different types of cooling systems (air cooling, water cooling, hybrid cooling)

Role of coolant and its properties

Safety precautions and handling procedures

Step-by-step guidance for replacing components and performing routine maintenance

By the end of this course, you'll have developed a comprehensive understanding of car coolant systems and be equipped with the skills to diagnose, maintain, and optimize water cooling systems effectively. Whether you're working on your personal vehicle or pursuing a career in automotive mechanics, this course will empower you with the expertise needed to ensure efficient and reliable cooling performance.
targetAudiences: Everyone who wants to learn Car Coolant systems and fix it

courseDetails.title: Microsoft Access für Einsteiger - Grundlagen für den Job
courseDetails.shortDescription: Nutze Microsoft Access und Access 365 im Job pragmatisch, ohne Dich mit sinnlosen Funktionen aufzuhalten!
courseDetails.longDescription:
Möchtest Du mit Microsoft Access im Beruf glänzen?

Microsoft Access ist in vielen Firmen die Standard-Datenbanksoftware für Desktop-Anwender.

Im Gegensatz zu "Profi"-Datenbankmanagementsystemen kannst Du mit Access in wenigen Minuten (mit Drag and Drop und ohne SQL Kenntnisse) eigene Datenbanken erstellen, die Dir einen Haufen Arbeit abnehmen.

In diesem Praxis-Kurs lernst Du meine Erfahrungen aus über 10 Jahren täglicher Arbeit mit Microsoft Access.

  • Lerne, wie Datenbanken funktionieren.

  • Lerne das Grundprinzip von relationalen Datenbanken kennen.

  • Lerne, was Abfragen sind und wozu man sie braucht.

  • Lerne die verschiedenen und effektivsten Formen von Abfragen kennen.

  • Lerne, wie Du Excel und Access optimal verknüpfst.

  • Lerne die besten Tipps und Kniffe, die sich im Büroalltag bewährt haben.


Der Kurs ist geeignet für Access 365, Access 2016, Access 2013 und frühere Versionen.


---- Wichtiges Update aufgrund der Bewertung von Lukas ----

Hallo Leute,

hier kommt eine wichtige Ankündigung! Jetzt folgen einige Theorie-Teile. Wenn Dir das zu langweilig ist, springe bitte direkt in den Praxisteil in Lektion 7.

Warum ist das so?

Ich habe in Bonn Informatik studiert, und im Grundstudium hatten wir alle eine Vorlesung über Datenbanken. Mich hat das Thema so fasziniert, weil wir einen Professor hatten, der uns die Grundlagen gründlich erklärt hat.

Und genau das möchte ich Euch hier, fast 20 Jahre später, in Form dieses Kurses weitergeben.

Mir ist klar, dass es für einen Udemy-Kurs unüblich ist, am Anfang erstmal 5 Lektionen Theorie zu lernen. Allerdings ist es mir so wichtig, Euch dieses Thema einmal gründlich beizubringen, dass ich das Risiko eingehe, einen "unüblichen" Kurs auf die Plattform zu stellen.

Viele Kurse gehen direkt in medias res und erklären alle möglichen Funktionen. Aber das bringt meines Erachtens nichts, wenn Du das Grundprinzip nicht verstanden hast. Umgekehrt lernst Du alles viel leichter, wenn Du das Grundprinzip kennst.

Also: Fühl Dich frei, direkt in Lektion 7 zu springen, falls Du das alles schon kennst. Ansonsten hoffe ich, dass Du es schätzen kannst.

Liebe Grüße,
Dein Sebastian Glöckner
targetAudiences: Menschen, die Access praxisnah kennenlernen wollen
Business Analysten / Projektmitarbeiter, die effektiver werden möchten
Jeder, der sich in Microsoft Access einarbeiten möchte oder es "muss"
Menschen, die die praktische Einordnung von Sebastian Glöckner erfahren möchten

courseDetails.title: Masterclass Cryptoactifs: Tout sur les Altcoins, NFT, DeFi
courseDetails.shortDescription: Tout ce que vous devez savoir sur les cryptos, les altcoins, le bitcoin, les NFT, le DeFi, et le Metaverse
courseDetails.longDescription:
Ce cours explique tout ce dont vous avez besoin de connaître sur les cryptomonnaies et comment accéder aux meilleures opportunités de cette industrie. Depuis la création de la crypto-monnaie, les personnes qui ne savent presque rien à ce sujet sont prêtes à payer pour savoir comment cela fonctionne.

L’industrie de la monnaie numérique a connu une grande affluence de cryptos au fil des ans et d’autres sont actuellement en cours de développement. Vous en apprendrez davantage sur l’une des technologies les plus récentes de l’industrie: le métavers. Le métavers est en train de devenir la prochaine grande chose dans l’histoire de l’humanité offrant différents avantages aux gens quel que soit leur niveau d’expérience. C’est un pont entre la réalité physique et la réalité virtuelle, et il révolutionne actuellement beaucoup de nos activités en tant qu’humains. Ce développement technologique a eu un impact positif sur des domaines tels que le divertissement, la médecine, l’éducation et bien d’autres. Ce cours vous éclairera sur les utilisations possibles de cette technologie et sur la façon dont vous pouvez les exploiter.

L’une des nombreuses choses que vous apprendrez est l’introduction générale à l’argent traditionnel que nous connaissons tous, en outre, vous en apprendrez davantage sur le contexte et l’origine de Bitcoin. En cours de route, vous apprendrez comment le Bitcoin, les Altcoins, les Meme coins, la DeFi, les NFTs et le Metaverse fonctionnent tous et pourquoi la blockchain est d’une grande importance en matière de crypto.

Vous en apprendrez également davantage sur les différents aspects de l’exploitation minière et du trading de crypto-monnaie, ainsi que sur les stratégies et tactiques impliquées pour vous aider à croître, à créer et à accumuler de la richesse. Nous ne pouvons pas parler de crypto-monnaies sans mentionner les portefeuilles cryptographiques, leur applicabilités, les différents types que nous avons, ainsi que la façon de les utiliser.

Pourquoi choisir ce cours?

Adapté aux débutants: Le cours a des instructeurs professionnels qui sont bien aguerris et qui connaissent le savoir-faire de Bitcoin et sont toujours disponibles pour vous mettre à travers le processus d’apprentissage.

Aucun codage n’est nécessaire pour apprendre comment fonctionne Bitcoin et comment vous pouvez l’utiliser à votre avantage, tout ce qui est exigé de vous est votre temps, votre dévouement et un bon téléphone avec accès à Internet.


Rejoignez-nous dans la Masterclass Crypto Ultime: Métavers, Opportunités, NFT, Meme Coins, DeFi, Bitcoin, Altcoins, Mining, et bien plus encore!

Si vous cherchez à prendre le train en marche de la tendance actuelle de la crypto-monnaie et que vous ne savez pas comment vous y prendre, alors ce cours est pour vous. courseDetails.title: التخطيط للأكتشاف الذاتي - مفاتيح الوصول لأهدافك
courseDetails.shortDescription: تعرف على المفاتيح الأساسية التي تسبق وضع اي هدف وتحوله من مجرد حلم الى هدف واضح قابل للتنفيذ
courseDetails.longDescription:
لدى كل منا عدة أهداف نرغب في تحقيقها لكن برغم الانضمام للكثير والكثير من الدورات والعديد من المحاولات تتحول بعض من أهدافنا الى مصدر إحباط بسبب عدم قدرتنا على تحقيقها صعوبة تحويلها الى خطط بخطوات واقعية تتناسب مع ظروف كل منا وتمكننا من تحقيق تلك الأهداف. بعد عدة سنوات من التعلم والتجارب وباستخدام علم النفس الايجابي توصلت الى سبب تكرر حدوث هذه الأزمة مع الأهداف وتعرفت على المفاتيح الأساسية التي سوف تمكنك من وضع أهدافك بشكل صحيح بما يتناسب مع قدراتك ومواهبك وظروفك الحياتية واليوم أشاركها معك في هذه الدورة


توضح هذه الدورة كيف يمكننا استخدام بعض مباديء علم النفس الايجابي ممزوجة بشخصياتنا المتفردة لتساعدنا على بناء نظامنا الخاص في وضع وتحقيق أهدافنا واكتسابنا لعادات جديدة وتخلصنا من عادات قديمة بكل يسر وبما يتناسب مع ظروفنا واحتياجاتنا المختلفة وبالوتيرة الخاصة بنا


بعد إتمامك لهذه الدورة سوف تتحول مهمة وضع الأهداف الى عملية بسيطة ومريحة وغير ضاغطة وسيمكنك التخطيط لأهدافك الجديدة وتنفيذ خططك بالفعل بخطوات واضحة, ثابتة, وقوية


هذه الدورة مناسبة لك اذا كنت

  • تمتلك أحلاما كبيرة وتريد تحويلها الى هداف واضحة قابلة للتنفيذ والتحقيق

  • لديك هدف كبير تسعى لتنفيذه دون جدوى وترغب في إعادة صياغة هذا الهدف وتحويله الى خطة قابلة للتنفيذ

  • تريد أن تتعرف على المفاتيح الرئيسية لوضع أهداف واضحة واكتساب عادات جديدة بشكل بسيط ومؤثر

بادر/بادري بالانضمام الآن
targetAudiences: لكل من يرغب في تطوير الوعى الذاتي

courseDetails.title: Digital Dropshipping: Das NEUE Geschäftsmodell
courseDetails.shortDescription: #1 Digitaler Dropshipping Kurs: Die Schritt für Schritt Anleitung für den Verkauf & Vermarktung von DIGITALEN Produkten
courseDetails.longDescription:
Du bist unprofitabel mit deinem Dropshipping Shop oder hast noch nicht einmal angefangen? Dann sei einer der ersten und lerne hier das neue Geschäftsmodell Digital Dropshipping !

Keine unseriösen chinesischen Händler, keine Produkteinkaufskosten und auch keine Lieferkosten / langen Lieferzeiten mehr. Ich zeige dir hier Schritt für Schritt wie du dir Rechte an fertigen, digitalen Produkten kaufst, ein profitablen Shopify Shop aufbaust und gezielte Online Werbung schaltest. Das alles machen wir live am PC zusammen und du siehst meine professionellen Produkte, Onlineshops und Werbekampagnen. Du brauchst dafür nur deinen Laptop und mind. 100€ Startkapital. Du wirst Skills und Wissen erlernen, die dir dein Leben lang nutzen stiften werden.


Was genau wirst du in diesem Kurs lernen?

1. Die richtige Nische finden + Lizenzrechte an fertigen, digitalen Produkten kaufen

2. Schritt für Schritt einen hochprofitablen Shopify Shop aufbauen

3. Digitale Produkte in deinen Shop implementieren und hochwertige Verkaufstexte schreiben

4. Shopify Themes erstellen, ändern und diese kundenfreundlich machen

5. Welche Apps, Frontend und Backend Einstellungen brauchst du

6. Günstig ein Logo erstellen lassen und Domain / Farbe anpassen

7. Professionelle Werbetexte schreiben ( Verkaufspsychologie )

8. Facebook Business Manager einrichten und verstehen!

9. iOS-14 Update richtig einrichten, um gezielter Kunden zu erreichen

10. Werbekampagnen erstellen und Facebook Ads schalten und verwalten

11. Was machen, wenn Werbeanzeigen oder Werbemanager gesperrt wurde?

12. Ab wann Werbung stoppen und wann skalieren um höhere Gewinn einzufahren

Und vieles mehr!


KURSSTRUKTUR

Zuallererst werde ich dich mit dem "digitalen Dropshipping Geschäftsmodell" vertraut machen. Anschließend werden wir zusammen eine Nische für dich suchen. Dabei zeig ich dir wie und wo du dir die Lizenzrechte an professionellen E-Books, Trainingsplänen, Videokurse etc. kaufen kannst. Keine Panik, die Lizenzrechte kosten meist unter 10€ und du kannst das digitale Produkt dann unendlich mal verkaufen. ( Du kannst natürlich auch selber ein Kurs / E-Book erstellen ) Das besondere an diesem Geschäftsmodell ist, dass chinesische Händleranbindungen, Lieferzeiten, Lieferkosten und sogar die Produktkosten wegfallen ( Da du nur einmal die Lizenzrechte kaufen musst ).

Du wirst lernen wie du einen Shopify Shop gezielt für digitale Produkte aufbaust und welche Apps du dafür benötigst. Ich werde dir das im Kurs vormachen, sodass du nur noch per Copy&Paste deinen Shop aufbauen musst. Ich zeige dir was du beachten musst, wenn du Produktbeschreibungen anfertigst, sie in Shopify importierst und die Produkte in die Seite einpflegst. Wir werden individuell für deine Nische ein Logo, Shopname / Farbe und Domain erstellen. 

Sobald wir damit fertig sind, werde ich dich mit verschiedenen Plattformen vertraut machen wie z.B. Facebook Business Manager. Ich werde mit dir Schritt für Schritt verschiedene hochprofitable Facebook Ads erstellen. Dabei lernst du wie man die richtige Zielgruppe für digitale Produkte targetiert und auf was du genau achten musst.

Ich werde LIVE in diesem Kurs einen Shopify Onlineshop aufbauen, Facebook Ads erstellen und skalieren. Du wirst demnach fähig sein mein System 1 zu 1 zu kopieren. Ganz am Ende des Kurses werde ich dir außerdem zeigen wie du deinen Shop, auch wenn er noch keinen einzigen Verkauf gemacht hat, für 150 Euro oder mehr verkaufen kannst.

Leg los, bevor du dich bereit fühlst! Es wird nie den perfekten Moment geben mit etwas anzufangen.

Du hast nichts zu riskieren und viel zu lernen! Wir sehen uns im Kurs :)
targetAudiences: Anfänger, die sich online selbständig machen möchten und Skills fürs Leben lernen wollen
All die Leute die keine Lust mehr auf das alte Dropshipping Model mit chinesischer Händleranbindung haben
Jeder der mehr Freiheit im Leben haben möchte und Geld von überall aus der Welt verdienen will
Angestellte, die nebenbei ein Business aufbauen und in die Selbständigkeit kommen möchten

courseDetails.title: Fire Up Creativity in Your Child
courseDetails.shortDescription: Increase Your Child's Creative Quotient to 10X
courseDetails.longDescription:
Child Creativity 3.0 - The #1 BEST-SELLING Child Creativity Course! (with over 250 ratings)


>> COURSE REGULARLY UPDATED (Last updated:   JULY   2023): NEW TIPS, MORE LESSONS <<

>> CERTIFIED COACH, SPEAKER, AND TRAINER <<

>> OVER 346,000 STUDENTS IN TOTAL <<


-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

What if I told you your child has special powers and latent abilities just waiting to be unleashed?? Sounds interesting?? Let’s go ahead and learn what this is all about…

Let me ask you a few questions. Do children today use their imaginations as much as we did when we were kids? Do you see your children spinning incredible tales and stories in their fantasy play as we used to when we played “cops and robbers” or “house”? Or does your child’s fantasy play seem to consist only of repetitive movements which have no story to them? I am sure you are aware of such a situation… Nowadays children are no longer as creative as they once were.  We live in an era obsessed with numbers, data, and test scores, especially as they apply to our kids and their education.  Seeing the decline in creativity should make us concerned about our children’s capacities to innovate, problem-solve, and navigate new and unfamiliar situations.     


In the world of child development, you may hear the phrases like “critical thinking skills” and “creative problem-solving abilities” when referring to goals for your child’s cognitive development. What we are really talking about is… imagination. The way to create human beings with imagination is to provide them with opportunities to develop it for themselves when they are very young. These opportunities are found in one place and one place only… that is, play. Played with paints, playing with play dough, costumes, glue, and crayons. Making a mess. Exploring the woods. Splashing in a puddle. Wondering at a caterpillar you notice inching by you. Pretending to be a bird, gliding through the sky. All of these involve a great deal of imagination and development of their creative skills to many folds. 


But, as parents, we must first learn the process of creative learning which we can offer to our kids. We parents should make ourselves aware of the different aspects of creative learning and critical thinking skills so that we can create an environment for our children to flourish in that environment.     In this course, we are going to discuss in detail the step-by-step process which you can walk your children through to make them creative learners and achievers. We have included many exercises and divided the course into 8 sections, each section focusing on the different aspects of creative learning for your child.  


In this course, we will help you understand the child’s psychology and you can help them in their creative journey. Being a parent I know the toughest thing is to have your child express their feeling to you. We have covered this most important aspect of creative self-expression through different exercises and fun methods. 


Are you a Non Profit or Charity helping the world?

Awesome! The world needs more people like you. Keep up the good work and let me know how I can help. To start with, get in touch with me to unlock free access to all of my courses. Just message me privately and I'll get that sorted for you and your team.
targetAudiences: Parents who are willing to foster creativity and creative thinking pattern in their children

instructors.name: Libby Seery Founder of Renaissance Life Therapies

courseDetails.longDescription:
Du bist unprofitabel mit deinem Marketing oder brauchst einen roten Faden an dem du dich orientieren kannst? Dann sei einer der ersten und lerne hier die 5-Phasen Werbestrategie und skaliere deine FB Ads to the MOOON !

Du wirst Skills und Wissen erlernen, die dir dein Leben lang nutzen stiften werden.


Was genau wirst du in diesem Kurs lernen?

KURSSTRUKTUR

Zuallererst werde ich dich mit dem Facebook Business Manager vertraut machen. Unser Tool mit dem wir über den gesamten Kurs arbeiten werden. Daraufhin bekommst du meine Marketing / Skalierungsregel an die Hand mit der wir in mehrere Phasen arbeiten werden. Anschließend werden wir zusammen deine erste Kampagne in Phase 1 aufbauen. In Phase 4 werden wir diese LAA nach einer speziellen Strategie skalieren und diese über längere Zeit profitabel laufen lassen. Hier testen wir auch weitere LAA Kampagnen. Phase 5 ist die Endstufe unserer Strategie und wird die 5-stellige Tagesumsätze einbringen. Es ist jedoch ein weiter Weg bis du in Phase 5 ankommst und diese anwenden kannst. Hauptfokus liegt auf Phase 3 & 4.

Ich werde LIVE in diesem Kurs mit dir zusammen eine Kampagne erstellen und diese nach der 5-Phasen Strategie skalieren. Du wirst demnach fähig sein mein System 1 zu 1 zu kopieren. Diese Strategie habe ich selber erstellt und wäre dir dankbar, wenn du diese für dich behältst.

Du hast nichts zu riskieren und viel zu lernen! Wir sehen uns im Kurs :)

courseDetails.title: Vue.JS de A à Z: Formation complète pour débutants
courseDetails.shortDescription: Un cours super pack pour les passionnés de JavaScript qui veulent apprendre le processus de création d’une application
courseDetails.longDescription:
**Un super cours pour les passionnés de JavaScript qui souhaitent apprendre tout le processus de création d’une applications avec Vue.JS**

Vue.JS est rapidement devenu l'un des frameworks JavaScript les plus populaires, et c'est aussi le plus accessible, à notre avis. Cependant, les frameworks peuvent faire peur et personne ne veut perdre de temps à configurer un environnement de développement local uniquement pour exécuter une simple application.

Pour démarrer avec Vue.JS, placez une balise de script sur une page et vous êtes prêt. Cette préparation vous permettra d'intégrer Vue.JS dans vos applications actuelles sans investir dans des chaînes d'outils complexes.

Tous les exemples de ce cours peuvent être réalisés en ajoutant simplement Vue à un seul fichier HTML et en écrivant un peu de JavaScript. Une série de didacticiels, d'exercices et de questionnaires vous aideront à apprendre à créer des applications Vue.JS.

Nous avons créé ce cours pour aider les novices à démarrer avec Vue JS et à devenir un expert Vue.JS.


Qu'est-ce que tu attends?
Inscris-toi à ce cours aujourd'hui !

Ce cours vise à vous pousser et à vous mettre au défi de passer du statut de novice complet de Vue.JS à celui d’expert parmi les 10 % des meilleurs développeurs Vue.

Ce didacticiel propose le cours en ligne Vue.JS le plus complet disponible ! Ce guide complet vous guidera à travers les sujets Vue.JS de base, intermédiaires et avancés. Vous travaillerez également sur divers projets et acquerrez toutes les compétences nécessaires pour devenir un développeur Vue.JS de haut niveau.

Vous n'avez besoin d'aucune connaissance préalable de Vue.JS ou de tout autre framework JS pour commencer. Cependant, vous devez avoir au moins une compréhension de base de HTML, CSS et JavaScript pour suivre ce cours.

courseDetails.title: NGINX, Apache, SSL Encryption - Certification Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Install, Configure, and Secure NGINX & Apache on an Ubuntu Server using Digital Ocean & Let's Encrypt SSL
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to our latest course, which will guide you through the process of installing, securing, and configuring NGINX or Apache on an Ubuntu web server. You will also learn to encrypt all web traffic, using a Free SSL certificate from Let’s Encrypt.

APACHE Section:

This course begins with exploring the most widely used web server technology available, Apache. Statistics show that Apache is used to run over 65% of all web servers around the world. Understanding how to work with Apache, is an instrumental part of the web development process. Students will learn the following key concepts:

  • Deploying a virtual server on Digital Ocean

  • Working with dynamic, static and floating IPs

  • Using Terminal for remote authentication

  • Installing and configuring LAMP Stack on Ubuntu 18.04

  • Testing PHP

  • Hosting Multiple Domains on one Apache Virtual Server

  • Configuring Virtual Host Files and Directives

  • DNS Zone File Configuration

NGINX Section:

NGINX is now considered the most powerful, efficient, and secure web server technology used to host web applications of all sizes and complexity. The software is open-source, and is designed for maximum performance and stability. It also aims to correct many of the short-falls of Apache, when it comes to delivering content to your end user. NGINX can be used for web serving, reverse proxying, caching, load balancing, media streaming, and much more.

The NGINX Section of this course will help you understand the following key concepts:

  • Understanding the difference between Apache & NGINX

  • Installing NGINX on a Digital Ocean Droplet or any Virtual Server of your choice.

  • Modifying the NGINX Block Configuration file for hosting Websites

  • Installing essential components on NGINX such as MySQL, PHP & PhpMyAdmin

  • Securing PhpMyAdmin using symbolic links and NGINX's built in authentication gateway.

  • Securing your hosted websites with free SSL using Certbot & Let's Encrypt

  • Installing and Configuring WordPress on your NGINX Server

SSL Certificates - Let's Encrypt

This section of the course offers an in-depth look into the role of SSL certificates when it comes to server security and web traffic encryption. We start with a thorough introduction which includes exploring different types of certificates and how they work. From there, students create a droplet on Digital Ocean and configure their own free SSL certificate using Let’s Encrypt Certificate Authority. This section of the course combines theoretical and hands-on training. Students have the opportunity to practice some of the concepts explored in the previous two sections, while also learning about free SSL Certificates, such as Let’s Encrypt.
targetAudiences: Students Interested in learning the Foundations of NGINX, Apache & SSL Encryption
Students interested in learning how SSL Certificates work
Web Developers interested in setting up NGINX on a Ubuntu Server, with MySQL, PHP, & PhpMyAdmin
Web Developers interested in setting up APACHE on Ubuntu with LAMP Stack (Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP)
Students interested in learn how to install and configure WordPress on NGINX

courseDetails.title: AutoCAD 2023: Produrre rapidamente incredibili planimetrie
courseDetails.shortDescription: Sviluppare una solida base in AutoCAD attraverso l'esperienza pratica
courseDetails.longDescription:
Questo corso di AutoCAD vi consentirà di iniziare il vostro percorso per diventare un utente esperto di e sviluppare competenze avanzate. Questo corso è progettato per i principianti e vi aiuterà nell'apprendimento di AutoCAD direttamente dalle basi.

Questo corso completo è un ottimo modo per dare il via alla vostra carriera nella progettazione con AutoCAD. Vi darà un vantaggio competitivo nella vostra carriera, distinguendovi dai vostri concorrenti.

Questo corso è rivolto ai principianti che desiderano apprendere i fondamenti di AutoCAD e sviluppare ulteriormente le competenze avanzate nei progetti e nei disegni. Per tutta la durata di questa MasterClass di AutoCAD, progetterete un progetto reale per prepararvi alle fasi successive del corso.

I principianti di questo corso impareranno innanzitutto a impostare il software per poter utilizzare AutoCAD. Man mano che si procede, si apprenderanno anche le abilità di base di selezione, creazione e modifica.


Qual è il contenuto di questo corso?

Questo corso parte dalle basi, fornendo la suddivisione di AutoCAD a livello elementare, per poi passare gradualmente ad argomenti più avanzati.

Il corso comprende video tutorial con applicazioni pratiche di strumenti e comandi.

Imparerete anche a lavorare con i file PDF e a importare e modificare i progetti di altri. Sarete anche in grado di creare diversi disegni dallo stesso modello utilizzando il metodo viewport.

Alla fine del corso sarete in grado di creare i vostri disegni utilizzando strumenti avanzati di AutoCAD come polilinee e archi. Sarete inoltre in grado di quotarli completamente secondo gli standard di disegno.

In sintesi, al termine di questo corso sarete in grado di utilizzare AutoCAD come un professionista.


Perché partecipare a questo corso?

Questo corso promette di fornirvi le competenze necessarie per intraprendere una carriera professionale con AutoCAD e non solo, sarete dotati di conoscenze CAD rilevanti che dimostreranno ai vostri clienti o datori di lavoro che avete acquisito destrezza in questo campo.

Durante l'apprendimento del corso, sarete guidati a costruire layout a partire da dimensioni date.

Questo MasterClass è stato progettato per aiutarvi a imparare AutoCAD da zero e per darvi il supporto necessario per affinare le vostre capacità.


Iscriviti subito e ottieni il pacchetto completo del corso di AutoCAD per principianti!
targetAudiences: Principianti, dilettanti, ingegneri, architetti, falegnami, designer d'interni, hobbisti o creativi che vogliono progettare e disegnare con AutoCAD
Tutti coloro che desiderano intraprendere una carriera in AutoCAD e che vogliono ottenere una buona retribuzione per le loro competenze in AutoCAD

courseDetails.title: Linode: Foundations of Web Server Security
courseDetails.shortDescription: Cloud Service Models | IaaS | Linode Basics | TFA | SSH | Linux | Ubuntu | LAMP Stack | DBMS | Firewalls | SSL
courseDetails.longDescription:
This course is designed to provide a comprehensive introduction to cloud computing and the foundations of server security. We cover a range of topics, starting from an introduction to cloud computing and cloud service models to cloud server deployment and configuration using Linode. We also explore the foundations of Linux, LAMP stack installation and configuration, server security, and SSL certificates.

The course begins with an introduction to cloud computing and the different service models available, such as Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS), Platform as a Service (PaaS), and Software as a Service (SaaS). This offers students a basic understanding of the different types of cloud services available along with various use cases.

Next, the course delves into server deployment and configuration using Linode. Linode is a popular cloud hosting provider that offers a range of services, including virtual private servers (VPS), storage, and networking. Students will learn how to deploy and configure a virtual instance and use it to host a website or application using LAMP Stack. LAMP stands for Linux, Apache, MySQL, and PHP and is a popular stack used to build dynamic websites and web applications. Students will learn how to install and configure each component of the stack and use it to create a functional website or web application. The course will then cover Linux foundations, where we explore the Linux file system, basic commands, and user accounts.

In the following section students explore server security, including best practices for securing a server and common security threats. Students will learn about firewalls, intrusion detection and prevention systems, and how to secure sensitive data. We will demonstrate how to setup custom ports, hardware firewalls, and software firewalls using UFW.

Finally, the course will cover installing and configuring SSL certificates. SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) is a standard security technology for establishing an encrypted link between a web server and a browser. Students will learn how to obtain, install, and configure an SSL certificate to secure their website or web application.

This course is well suited for anyone interested in cloud computing and server administration. By the end, student will be proficient with navigating Linode, while deploying and configuring remote instances using the latest in cloud technology. If this sounds exciting, then hit the enol button and let’s get started.
targetAudiences: Students interested in Cloud Computing
Students interested in Remote Server Deployment and Configuration
Students interested in Server Security
Students interested in the Foundations of Linux
Students interested in LAMP Stack Installation and Configuration
Students interested in how SSL Certificates Works
Students interested in SSL Certificate Installation and Configuration

courseDetails.title: Machine Learning: Aplicado a Python y Data Science
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende a crear algoritmos de Machine Learning en Python para estudiantes y profesionales
courseDetails.longDescription:
Para entender cómo organizaciones como Google, Amazon e incluso Udemy utilizan el Machine Learning y la inteligencia artificial (IA) para extraer el significado y los conocimientos de enormes conjuntos de datos , este curso de Machine Learning te proporciona lo esencial. Según Glassdoor y Indeed, los científicos de datos ganaron un sueldo medio de 120.000 dólares, ¡y eso es solo la norma!


Cuando se trata de ser atractivo, los científicos de datos ya lo son. En un mercado laboral altamente competitivo, es difícil retenerlos una vez contratados. Las personas con una mezcla única de formación científica, experiencia informática y capacidad de análisis son difíciles de encontrar.


Al igual que los "quants" de Wall Street de los años ochenta y noventa, se espera que los científicos de datos de hoy en día tengan un conjunto de habilidades similares. Las personas con formación en física y matemáticas acudieron a los bancos de inversión ya los fondos de cobertura en aquella época porque pudieron idear algoritmos y métodos de datos novedosos.


Dicho esto, la ciencia de los datos se está convirtiendo en una de las ocupaciones más adecuadas para el éxito en el siglo XXI. Se trata de una profesión informatizada, basada en la programación y de naturaleza analítica. Por lo tanto, no es de extrañar que la necesidad de científicos de datos haya preocupado en el mercado laboral en los últimos años.


La oferta, en cambio, ha sido bastante restringida. Es un reto conseguir los conocimientos y habilidades necesarios para ser contratado como científico de datos .


En este curso, las notaciones y matemáticas la jerga se reducen a lo más básico, cada tema se explica en un lenguaje sencillo, lo que facilita su comprensión. Una vez que tengas en tus manos el código, podrás jugar con él y construir sobre él. El énfasis de este curso está en entender y usar estos algoritmos en el mundo real , no en un contexto teórico o académico.


Saldrás de cada vídeo con una nueva idea que podrás poner en práctica de inmediato.


Todos los niveles de habilidad son bienvenidos en este curso, e incluso si no tienes experiencia estadística previa, ¡podrás tener éxito!
targetAudiences: Cualquier persona que quiera seguir una carrera relacionada con Machine Learning
Cualquier entusiasta de la programación en Python que desee añadir a sus conocimientos "Machine Learning"

courseDetails.title: Aprende JavaScript de CERO a EXPERTO
courseDetails.shortDescription: Aprende JavaScript sin ningún conocimiento previo
courseDetails.longDescription:
JavaScript es un lenguaje de programación ligero, interpretado o compilado justo a tiempo, con funciones de primera clase. Aunque es más conocido como lenguaje de scripting para páginas web, muchos entornos ajenos a los navegadores también lo utilizan, como Node.js, Apache CouchDB y Adobe Acrobat. JavaScript es un lenguaje basado en prototipos, multiparadigma, monohilo y dinámico, que admite estilos orientados a objetos, imperativos y declarativos (por ejemplo, programación funcional).

JavaScript es el lenguaje de programación más popular del mundo. Junto con HTML (que se utiliza para la estructura de la página web), y CSS (que se utiliza para el estilo); JavaScript (que se utiliza para la funcionalidad), se considera uno de los lenguajes fundamentales para el desarrollo web. Aun así, JavaScript está en todas partes, ya no es un lenguaje exclusivo de la web, podemos encontrárnoslo en los servidores, en las aplicaciones escritorio multiplataforma,  y en muchos otros ámbitos. Por lo tanto, saber programar en JavaScript puede ofrecer grandes oportunidades laborales.

Este curso de JavaScript te llevará desde principiante hasta profesional. Este curso está diseñado desde la perspectiva de un estudiante que no tiene conocimientos previos de programación y que es un principiante en JavaScript. Además, está definido de una forma en la que se va de los aspectos más básicos a los más complejos, para que el alumno pueda ir adquiriendo las bases de la programación en JavaScript de la mejor manera posible.

Entre los contenidos de este curso se encuentran los siguientes:

  • Sintaxis básica de JavaScript

  • Variables y tipos de datos

  • Trabajar con variables de texto

  • Trabajar con variables numéricas

  • Estructuras de datos

  • Sentencias condicionales

  • Bucles iterativos

  • Declaración de funciones

  • Programación Orientada a Objetos

Por lo tanto, a lo largo de este completo curso, cubrimos una gran cantidad de habilidades y técnicas que incluyen las aspectos más esenciales para programar en JavaScript y en cualquier otro lenguaje de programación.

Al realizar este curso, te convertirás en un programador de JavaScript fluido y serás tan bueno que podrás conseguir una oferta de trabajo razonable como desarrollador de JavaScript y utilizar el lenguaje profesionalmente.
targetAudiences: Este curso está dirigido a cualquier persona que esté interesada en aprender a programar con JavaScript

courseDetails.title: French proverbs for intermediate students
courseDetails.shortDescription: Understand both language and culture in French
courseDetails.longDescription:
Proverbs are short and pithy statements. They offer life advice, wisdom or a general truth. Proverbs are often so common that native speakers would use them in conversations without even realizing it. A proverb can be a shortcut in explaining something. They communicate an accepted message in a few well-worn and well-known words.

Illustrating a point to be made, proverbs are oftentimes metaphorical or symbolic in nature. Some proverbs can be reflective of a specific culture. However, the majority is widely embraced and quite often passed down through generations and generations. In fact, some of the earliest recorded proverbs date back to 2000 BC. Even to the ancient Sumerians who would write them on stone tablets.

A few examples:

  • An apple a day keeps the doctor away.
    Chaque jour une pomme conserve son homme.

  • Barking dogs seldom bite. 
    Chien qui aboie ne mord pas.

  • As you make your bed, so you must lie.
    Comme on fait son lit, on se couche.

  • You can't teach an old dog new tricks.
    Ce n'est pas aux vieux singes qu'on apprend à faire des grimaces.

  • When in doubt, leave it out. 
    Dans le doute, abstiens-toi.

A key element in learning a language and a culture is proverbs. It's only when you're able to use proverbs properly that you can really set yourself apart and be considered a professional or even a native speaker.

Set the bar a bit higher and become an expert in French with these common proverbs, you'll amaze a few people along the way.
targetAudiences: Students who want to go from intermediate French to professional

courseDetails.title: The Complete Persian Language Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn Farsi - Learn Persian - Farsi Language TPRS/TPR Method, Audio Submissions, Story by Native
courseDetails.longDescription:
The Complete Persian Language Course Farsi Course:: Master the Farsi Language Using the TPRS/TPR Method, Audio Submissions, and Stories Told by Native Speakers

Persian is a pluricentric language predominantly spoken and used officially within Iran, Afghanistan, and Tajikistan in three mutually intelligible standard varieties, namely Iranian Persian, Dari Persian (officially named Dari since 1958), and Tajiki Persian (officially named Tajik since the Soviet era). It is also spoken natively in the Tajik variety by a significant population within Uzbekistan, as well as within other regions with a Persianate history in the cultural sphere of Greater Iran. It is written officially within Iran and Afghanistan in the Persian alphabet, a derivation of the Arabic script, and within Tajikistan in the Tajik alphabet, a derivation of Cyrillic.

In this class, I  provide you with every service so you learn and speak Persian effortlessly. I will use these methods for teaching:

  • Teaching you storytelling based on the TPRS method. This is how you learn Persian speaking from me. And you practice through video.

  • Inspiring you to learn more and learn the technique of learning in language learning

The practice tests is designed in a friendly and engaging manner to make learning enjoyable, and our experienced instructors are here to support you every step of the way.


Sample TypeScript Interview Question

Question: What is the default access modifier for members of a class in TypeScript?

Option 1: Private

Option 2: Public

Option 3: Protected

Option 4: Internal

Correct Option: 2

Explanation: In TypeScript, the default access modifier for members of a class is public. This means that by default, all members of a class are accessible from outside the class. If you do not specify an access modifier for a member of a class, it will be considered public. To make a member private, you can use the private keyword in front of the member declaration. Private members are only accessible from within the class and cannot be accessed from outside the class. [referance ulr]

Obtaining a Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification can significantly benefit employees in various ways. Firstly, it provides individuals with a solid foundation in digital transformation and digital business strategies. This knowledge is increasingly essential in today's technology-driven world, where businesses must adapt to stay competitive. By acquiring this certification, employees demonstrate their expertise in leading digital initiatives, enabling them to become valuable assets within their organizations.


Secondly, the CDO Certification enhances career prospects by opening up new opportunities in the digital field. Companies across industries are actively seeking professionals who can drive digital innovation and transformation. With this certification, employees can showcase their proficiency in developing and implementing digital strategies, which gives them a competitive edge in the job market.


Furthermore, the CDO Certification helps employees develop a comprehensive skill set necessary for successful digital leadership. It covers a wide range of topics, including digital marketing, data analytics, cybersecurity, user experience, and emerging technologies. This diverse knowledge equips individuals with the ability to navigate complex digital landscapes, make data-driven decisions, and drive organizational growth.


Importance for Companies:

For companies, having employees certified as Chief Digital Officers brings numerous advantages. Firstly, certified CDOs possess the expertise needed to drive digital transformation initiatives. They understand the intricacies of digital technologies, consumer behavior, and industry trends, enabling them to develop effective strategies that align with business goals. With a certified CDO at the helm, companies can accelerate their digital transformation efforts and stay ahead of the competition.


Secondly, certified CDOs are equipped to optimize customer experiences and engagement. They possess a deep understanding of digital marketing techniques, user experience design, and data analytics. This expertise allows them to leverage customer insights and implement personalized strategies that enhance customer satisfaction, loyalty, and retention.


Moreover, CDO Certification ensures that companies have leaders who can effectively manage digital risks and cybersecurity threats. With the increasing reliance on digital platforms and data, organizations must prioritize data privacy, protection, and compliance. Certified CDOs are well-versed in implementing robust cybersecurity measures and establishing data governance frameworks, mitigating risks and safeguarding sensitive information.


Digital Transformation and Digital Business:

Digital Transformation and Digital Business topics covered in the CDO Certification are highly valuable for building a career. In today's digital era, businesses are continuously evolving to leverage technology for innovation, efficiency, and growth. Professionals who possess expertise in digital transformation and digital business strategies are in high demand across industries.


Understanding the fundamentals of digital transformation enables individuals to identify opportunities for disruption, create agile and customer-centric strategies, and drive organizational change. Digital business topics equip professionals with the knowledge to leverage emerging technologies, such as artificial intelligence, blockchain, and the Internet of Things, to develop innovative business models, improve operational efficiency, and create new revenue streams.


Professionals with expertise in digital transformation and digital business are well-positioned for leadership roles in various industries, including finance, healthcare, retail, manufacturing, and more. They have the skills to navigate the evolving digital landscape, embrace emerging technologies, and lead organizations through successful digital transformations.


The Chief Digital Officer (CDO) Certification plays a crucial role in equipping professionals with the necessary knowledge, skills, and credentials to excel in the digital world. It provides employees with a competitive advantage, enhances career prospects, and enables them to become valuable assets to their organizations. For companies, having certified CDOs empowers them to drive digital transformation, optimize customer experiences, and manage digital risks effectively. Moreover, the digital transformation and digital business topics covered in the certification are instrumental in building a successful career in the rapidly evolving digital landscape.

courseDetails.title: Securing Microservices using Identity Server 4
courseDetails.shortDescription: Complete guide to build enterprise edition application end to end
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to "Securing Microservices using Identity Server 4" - second edition of Microservices Learning Series. The ultimate course for developers who want to learn how to build scalable, efficient, and robust Microservices using the .Net Core platform along with Docker, Kubernetes, Identity Server 4, Rabbit MQ, Angular 15, GRPC, Istio Service Mesh, SQL Server, MongoDB, PostGreSQL, Redis, Ocelot, Nginx, Azure, Helm Charts, and Auto Scale.

In this comprehensive course, you'll gain hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes to deploy and manage your Microservices. You'll learn how to integrate Identity Server 4 for secure authentication and authorization, Rabbit MQ for messaging, and GRPC for efficient communication between Microservices.

You'll also learn how to use Istio Service Mesh to manage Microservices traffic, and how to configure and optimize SQL Server, MongoDB, PostGreSQL, and Redis for your Microservices. You'll use Ocelot and Nginx to manage your Microservices API gateway and deploy your Microservices to Azure using Helm Charts.

By the end of this course, you'll have a solid understanding of how to design, develop, and deploy Microservices using the latest industry-standard tools and practices, including auto-scaling.

Who Should Take This Course?

  1. Freshers who want to learn how to build scalable and efficient systems using Microservices architecture.

  2. Junior Developers who are looking to level up their skills and gain experience building real-world Microservices applications.

  3. Mid-Level Developers who want to learn how to build and deploy Microservices using the latest industry-standard tools and practices.

  4. Senior Developers who are looking to stay ahead of the curve and keep their skills up-to-date with the latest trends and technologies.

  5. Software Architects who want to learn how to design and develop scalable, distributed, and fault-tolerant systems using Microservices.

  6. Technical Leads who want to gain a deeper understanding of Microservices architecture and lead their teams in building scalable and efficient systems.

Welcome to the Identity Server 4 course, the second course in our Microservices series! This course builds on the foundational knowledge you gained in our first course, "Creating .Net Core Microservices using Clean Architecture", and focuses specifically on implementing secure Authentication and Authorization for your Microservices using Identity Server 4.

Identity Server 4 is a powerful and highly extensible open source framework that provides a complete solution for managing authentication and authorization in modern web applications and APIs. In this course, you will learn how to use Identity Server 4 to secure your microservices by implementing features such as:

  • User Authentication using popular identity providers such as Google, Facebook, and Twitter

  • User Authorization based on roles and claims

  • Integration with your existing user database or user management system

  • Secure token-based authentication using JSON Web Tokens (JWT)

  • Secure communication between Microservices using client credentials and access tokens

Throughout this course, you will work on a practical project that will guide you through the entire process of integrating Identity Server 4 into your Microservices architecture. You will learn how to configure Identity Server 4, integrate it with your Microservices, and implement secure authentication and Authorization using the OAuth 2.0 and OpenID Connect protocols.

By the end of this course, you will have a solid understanding of how to use Identity Server 4 to implement secure Authentication and Authorization for your Microservices. You will also be able to apply these concepts to your own projects and take your Microservices architecture to the next level.

Enroll now and take the next step in your Microservices journey with the Identity Server 4 course!

Disclaimer:- Assuming you have already completed the prerequisite courses listed below in bold letters, as this course cannot be taken as a stand-alone course. Without the foundational knowledge and skills provided in those courses, you may struggle with understanding the API setup and overall flow of the course.

1. Getting Started with Microservices using Clean Architecture

2. Securing Microservices using Identity Server 4 (Current Course)

(Next Courses of this series)

4. Versioning Microservices

6. Deploying Microservices to Kubernetes and AKS

IDE Required:- You can either use Visual Studio or JetBrains Rider, or VS Code itself.

Welcome to the ‘Starting with Hilla from Vaadin’ course. With this course, you are going to add value to your existing JAVA and SpringBoot knowledge by getting familiar with Hilla web framework. Adopting Hilla will help you create a full-stack (frontend/backend) applications in one project structure using a well know technologies like Java, Typescript, SpringBoot, and Node.js.


The course covers several topics often useful in corporate JAVA development but not exclusively. SpringBoot is being used here as an underlying framework used by Hilla web framework by default. Hilla integrates a Spring Boot Java back end with a reactive TypeScript front end. It helps you build apps faster with type-safe server communication, including UI components, and integrated tooling.


The primary idea of this course is to help existing SpringBoot/Java developers to adopt Hilla web framework and move from common backend development to frontend also. Hilla makes this connection much more feasible and you hopefully get a taste of this in our course. Are you working with Angular or React with SpringBoot backend? This course can help you to get a taste of more tight integration Hilla makes to SpringBoot backend and reuse your existing SpringBoot skills on a full scale.


Topics covered by this course:
During a course, we create a basic Hilla single-page application and each lecture will add a new enhancement to it. Eventually, we create a single application with many different features.

  • understanding Hilla project structure

  • creating a single-page Hilla application step-by-step

  • using MongoDB as persistent data storage

  • collaboration using server Push technology

  • export application data in MS Excel format


An important part of this course is to realize 'what we don't need to do' when using Hilla. Simplification can be huge and the old saying that 'the best code is the code you don't have to write' is proven here.


GitHub repository:

The source code is available through the link attached to the last lecture in this course. You can clone the repo and use the code snippets we are building in this course.


Who is this course for:

‘Starting with Hilla’ course is targeted at individuals or small/medium teams of professional Java developers that want to be productive and competitive in this large market. You will see how Hilla and Vaadin take away the unnatural "need" to split teams into Frontend and Backend developers, with all the communication hassles that come with that all the time.

courseDetails.title: FreeBSD 13.x - Mastering JAILS
courseDetails.shortDescription: Using FreeBSD Jails for securely running software packages using a pragmatic approach.
courseDetails.longDescription:
Hello,

welcome to the ‘FreeBSD 13.x - Mastering JAILS’ course. The purpose of this course is to give a deep overview of what Jails are, and how to use them for building testing or production-ready environments. All this using a great BastilleBSD project.


What you'll learn:

  • Create FreeBSD lab environment for a safe Jails testings

  • Get deeper understanding what Jails are

  • Maintain Jails using BastileBSD

  • Understand Jails networking

  • Get some practice with Jails backups

  • Use BastileBSD for maintaining multiple Jails environment in seamless way


What are FreeBSD Jails from Wikipedia:

"The jail mechanism is an implementation of FreeBSD's OS-level virtualization that allows system administrators to partition a FreeBSD-derived computer system into several independent mini-systems called jails, all sharing the same kernel, with very little overhead. It is implemented through a system called jails, as well as a userland utility plus, depending on the system, a number of other utilities. The functionality was committed into FreeBSD in 1999 by Poul-Henning Kamp after some period of production use by a hosting provider and was first released with FreeBSD 4.0, thus being supported on a number of FreeBSD descendants, including DragonFly BSD, to this day.


The need for the FreeBSD jails came from a small shared-environment hosting provider's (R&D Associates, Inc.'s owner, Derrick T. Woolworth) desire to establish a clean, clear-cut separation between their own services and those of their customers, mainly for security and ease of administration (jail(8)). Instead of adding a new layer of fine-grained configuration options, the solution adopted by Poul-Henning Kamp was to compartmentalize the system – both its files and its resources – in such a way that only the right people are given access to the right compartments."


Topics covered in this course:
'Mastering Jails' course covers most of the Jails setup options available and required for running Jails in real live scenarios. The main topics include:

  • Jails Essentials

  • Creating a FreeBSD Lab environment

  • Using BastilleBSD for managing Jails in many different ways

  • Setting Jails networking in the right way

  • BONUS: Running FreeBSD Jail on Raspberry PI

During the course, we build a lab environment with fresh FreeBSD installation and we setup Jails from the ground to a production-ready environment. We will practice working with Jails, backing them up, or do networking the right way. All this using a great BastilleBSD project.


Summary:

FreeBSD 13.x Mastering Jails course covers various topics related to using Jails to manage running different software packages in a secure way. Using Jails you can avoid security issues/holes in software packages you host on your system.
targetAudiences: ‘FreeBSD 13.x - Mastering JAILS’ course is targeted for individuals or small/medium teams of professional administrators, devops or developers. Jails can serve as a production ready server side option, testing environment for admins and developers or as runtime option for projects backends during development process.

Three reasons to TAKE THIS COURSE right now!

The unique reasons for taking this course are:

  1. Complete, Concise, Confident Overview of Kanban - I cover the theory and give you examples of how the theory is used in industry.

  2. Confidence in using Kanban - In a very simple way, I teach you the fundamentals of Kanban and how to use Kanban in industry without going into a class room or spending $£1000..

  3. You get to ask me questions and see me respond to every single one of them thoughtfully!

Includes Narration from Christian Carvajal

What is Kanban?

Kanban is a method for just in time delivery of tasks (such as products services, support and maintenance) without overloading our workforce . Based on my experience, it is the most popular way to meet just in time delivery for a lean businesses while increasing efficiency.

Who should take is course?

Whether you are a product owner, business owner, support/maintenance/dev ops/sales team member, business stakeholder or simply someone who wants the answer to the question "what is a kanban", this is definitely the class is for you.

What will I learn?

In this class you will learn:

  • Concise overview of Kanban - Including Origin, How to use The Kanban Board, Workflow, Work In Progress Limits, Priority setting, The Pull System.

  • The facts based on real industry experience and research - The correct terminology and use of Kanban is essential to mastering it. My experience in industry and research into the topic has been used to give you a solid grounding in the most concise way possible.

  • Support/Dev Ops/Product Owners / AgileTeam Members - I give you a complete overview of kanban as used in the business work place without having to do a face to face course saving you hundreds if not thousands of dollars.

The course is video based with no supporting document necessary.

How is the course structured?

Each section features an overview of a particular aspect of kanban such as it's Origin, How to use The Kanban Board, Workflow, Work In Progress Limits, Priority setting, The Pull System.  Examples are included throughout the course wirh excellent quality video and audio. All is based real world experience.

Inspired by God, the Bible, my mother and father, David J. anderson.

Anyone who wants a complete overview of Kanban and certainty that they are getting the facts taught by an Agile expert
